text: Bastutah'ada-era ksetre -- tara takhana prthibite yukti byatireke ahankara karata, ara balata -- ''amadera ceye balabikrame besi saktisali ke ache?â€™â€™ Tara ki tabe dekhate paya ni ye, allah yini tadera srsti karechena tini tadera ceye balabikrame adhika baliyana? Ara tara amadera nirdesabali sanbandhe bada-pratibada karata.
